description:
Tree Works Application in King's Cross / St Pancras (GLC) Conservation Area, The Old School, YORK Way Islington London N1 0AE
 
A tree application has been received to do the following work to trees to the rear of the above address; all trees / shrubs are within the property.

 Rear Garden/Parking area:

 
1 X Cherry tree.

- Lift crown overall to 2.5 metres

- Crown Thin by 5% by removing crossing and rubbing branches

 1 X Ornamental Apple

-          Fell to ground level and treat stump

1 X Cherry Tree

            - Crown Lift to 2.5 metres
           

1 X Robinia 

Crown thin by 15-20% 

- Removal of deadwood in crown 

Crown lift over parking area to 3-4 metres, leaving a natural shape

 1 X Robinia (root sucker) suppressed by the larger tree.

            Cut down to ground level-as far as possible- DO NOT POISON STUMP


1 X Apple spp. Fell to ground level- and poison stump
Suppressed by the large Robinia. 

 

Unknown quantity of Buddleias growing 'all over around' the Substation, 

Fell to ground level and poison stump.
